response.overview: Tenerife is an island that inspires - because of its diversity, its climate and its authenticity. Tenerife is an island with countless charming nooks and crannies. She surprises her visitors with contrasts. A wildly rugged volcanic coast. Dense and magical laurel forests. The lunar landscape of the national park. Picturesque towns with Canarian architecture and traditional craftsmanship. Tenerife is also called: a continent in miniature. And indeed, nature shows its full diversity that no other Canary Island can offer
response.title: Tenerife - under the Teide
